level.text: 503.1 An Emergency Medical Services Agency shall notify the Director, in a manner that the Director prescribes, of any change in the protocols or authorized drug list of the agency no fewer than thirty (30) days prior to the change.
An Emergency Medical Services Agency shall notify the Director, in a manner that the Director describes, of any change in the medical director of the agency, as required by Subsection 504.6.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Rules of the Board of Public Welfare issued July 28, 1950; as amended on September 29, 1950; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 16569 (December 6, 2013).
